title: Spirit - Model Shop (1968; 2005) [FLAC]
description:
"Model Shop " is a 2005 album by the Los Angeles group, Spirit, which collects the material they recorded in 1968, for the soundtrack to Jacques Demy's never released film Model Shop. Chronologically, the album's material falls in between their second and third albums, The Family That Plays Together (1968) and Clear (1969) respectively ( Wikipedia ). 



Spirit - Model Shop
Label: Sundazed Music - SC 6197, Sony Music Custom Marketing Group - A74719
Format: CD, Album, Mono
Country: US
Released: 2005
Genre: Rock
Style: Psychedelic Rock, Classic Rock

Recorded in 1968.
All tracks are mono.
Tracks 2, 4 to 6 & 10 to 12, are previously inissued versions, making their first appearence on this set.
